EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry Summit - Before you Go!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cfsummit.com/> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}! We look forward to seeing you at the Cloud Foundry Summit on next on Monday, June 9 – Wednesday, June 11, 2014 at the Hilton Union Square. Below you will find important information to help you finalize your plans. Please review carefully to ensure your registration details are accurate. CONFERENCE SCHEDULE We are using the Cloud Foundry Summit mobile site so that attendees can easily access information regarding the conference schedule and activities! Please visit cfsummit.com <http://cfsummit.com/> for updated schedule informationto stay updated.
LOCATION & HOTEL ACCOMMODATION
Hilton Union Square 333 O’Farrell Street San Francisco, CA 94102 (415) 771-1400
Your hotel accommodation, including all room, tax and incidental charges, will be billed to your credit card, which is required upon check-in. Check-in time is 3:00 pm and check-out time is 12:00 pm. Any changes to your hotel reservation must be made through the online Passkey system <https://aws.passkey.com/g/24211375> by clicking “Existing Reservations” at the top of the page. Hotel cancellations must be submitted to the hotel more than (72) hours prior to your arrival day to avoid being charged. Cancellations within 72 hours of your arrival date will be assessed a one night's cancellation charge. DIRECTIONS & TRANSPORTATION The hotel is located thirteen miles equidistant from both San Francisco International Airport (SFO) and the Oakland International Airport (OAK). Attendees are on their own for transportation to and from the hotel. Please use one of the following methods: Taxis: 25 minute transfer from SFO with an estimated fee of $50 or 35 minute transfer from OAK with estimated $60 fee. Shuttle: Estimated $17 one-way BART (Bay Area Rail Transit): The subway transit line runs approximately every 15 minutes from the San Francisco Airport (SFO) to the Powell Street Station. The ride is about 20 minutes from SFO. The cost is $8.65. The AirBART shuttle runs approximately every 10 minutes from the Oakland Airport (OAK) with a transfer to a BART train to the Powell Street Station. The ride is about 20 minutes from OAK. The cost is $4.05. To learn more about taking BART from either airport click here <http://www.bart.gov/guide/airport>. Parking: If you wish to park at the hotel, the garage entrance is located on Ellis Street is approximately $55 per day for self-parking. Please refer to the hotel website <http://www.bart.gov/guide/airport> for more detailed information on directions and parking.

MEALS Breakfast, breaks, and lunch are included for all participants at the Cloud Foundry Summit. EVENING EVENTS
- Welcome & Keynote – Monday, June 9 – 6:00 pm – 7:30 pm, Grand Ballroom B - Opening Reception – Monday, June 9 – 7:30 pm – 9:00 pm, Grand Ballroom A & B - Closing Reception – Wednesday, June 11 – 6:00 pm – 7:00 pm, Grand Ballroom A & B
Social Media Don’t forget to share your experience! Use #cfsummit for your tweets/pictures and follow us @cloudfoundry for all the latest news and information! QUESTIONS Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please contact Team Cloud Foundry at: Email: pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>
We look forward to seeing you at the Summit!
Team Cloud Foundry #cfsummit
